item.name: INIT: Load Crypto Library for RS256

request.description:
Load the RSA-Sign Crypto LIbrary in a global environment variable

Source: http://kjur.github.io/jsrsasign/jsrsasign-latest-all-min.js

Github: https://github.com/kjur/jsrsasign

item.name: Create Streaming XDM Inlet -  - Sink for Customer Kafka Connect

request.description:
Generated from a curl request: 
CURL -X POST \"https://platform.adobe.io/data/core/edge/inlet\" \
  -H \"Cache-Control: no-cache\" \
  -H \"Content-Type: application/json\" \
  -H \"Authorization: Bearer {{ACCESS_TOKEN}}\" \
  -H \"x-api-key: {{API_KEY}}\" \
  -H \"x-gw-ims-org-id: {{IMS_ORG}}\" \
  -d '{
       \"name\" : \"customer_kafka_streaming_inlet\",
       \"description\" : \"Customer Kafka Streaming Inlet\",
       \"sourceId\" : \"customer_kafka\",
       \"dataType\": \"xdm\"
   }'
